page.title: 08HOMES FOR THE ELDERLY
page.content: SINGHOLM There are 25 people who work at Singholm, 3 which live in 14 part time and 8 full time.Most of the residents come from South East England and the most they can look after are 42 but at that time they were looking after 36 people.The home has been open about 30 years before that it was a Singer Sewing Machine Company and a troop billet.Out of all the residents there is only one man the rest are women.The oldest person is 103 years old and two people are coming up to 100 years old. POPLARS We asked the staff some questions first of all. We found out that they had 4 full time and 27 part time workers but nobody lived in. The home has people from the Walton area mostly.They can take 40 people when it
